channel.title: Dune 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dune 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jason Momoa Says His Son Got Cast in ‘Dune 3’ on His Own and ‘I Don’t Want to Help Him’: ‘He’s 16 and Holding S— Down With Denis Villeneuve’
item.description: Jason Momoa told Extra at the premiere of Apple TV+’s “Chief of War” in Kapolei, Hawaii, that he played no part in landing his son, Nakoa-Wolf, a major new role in “Dune: Part Three.&#8221

item.title: Jason Momoa Says His Son Got Cast in ‘Dune 3’ on His Own and ‘I Don’t Want to Help Him’: ‘He’s 16 and Holding S— Down With Denis Villeneuve’
